text:
I’m writing to ask about Apache.

We are using more than 100 domains in the httpd-vhosts.conf and httpd-ssl.conf. But intermittently httpd process cpu rate exceeds 100%, and every time the process is killed.

- httpd-vhosts.conf : ServerName = 35, ServerAlias = 78

- httpd-ssl.conf : ServerName = 17, ServerAlias = 2

Is there a recommended number of domains in Apache 2.2?

Please inform us this issue as soon as possible.
creator: jsoh813@hanmail.net
toscano.luca@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

please use the users@ mailing list instead of bugzilla for this kind of requests.

http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html

Thanks!
